name: Apache - Excelencia
additionalNotes: The Apache line offers a medium to full body cigar experience that is complex and full of flavor. With notes of pepper, spices, chocolate sweetness and a light touch of espresso, each Apache cigar invites smokers to enjoy a unique and captivating experience. Manufactured with care in the Pepito Gomez Tobacco Co. in Estelí, Nicaragua, the Apache is available in four vitolas to satisfy the most demanding tastes of cigar fans.
